name: A Cat's Dream
description:
Calebbie is worried about his good friend, Thomas; but to reunite with his buddy, he'll have to travel to the depths of a dream about a hooman and a cat.

Note: If your anti-virus protection flags the compressed .exe version, try the zip file instead, then run Game.exe.

GAME JAM ENTRY

Dream of a Cat is our first RPG Maker VXA title, inspired by merging themes from two game jams together:

  1. Duality Jam challenges game makers to explore "mirror worlds," so we created a reality where hoomanity is in charge, and another where cats reign...
  2. Weekly Game Jam #140 is themed "shapeshift," so we dramatically change our main character midway through the story—then switch forms again when it's time to pick a costume!

Let us know if you'd like to see future updates for A Cat's Dream. We're currently designing 20+20 prototypes for 2020 by participating in game jams!—and it's exciting to hear when someone likes one of our ideas.
